front.title: Definitions of Managed Objects for Open Provisioning Standard In Loop Access Environment

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes objects used for Flow Through Provisioning from a network management system at the Network Operation Center (NOC) of carriers or service providers. This memo specifies a MIB module in a manner that is both compliant to the SNMPv2 SMI, and semantically identical to the peer SNMPv1 definitions.
